description: Configuration bundle for a set of honeypot services with unique vulnerabilities.

services.description: HTTP service simulating an API with a vulnerability for unauthorized information enumeration.
services.cve_description: This vulnerability potentially allows unauthorized enumeration of information from the embedded device APIs.

plugin.prompt: Simulate a response for unauthorized API access.

services.description: SSH service with a command injection vulnerability allowing arbitrary system command execution.
services.cve_description: Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands on the device.

services.description: HTTP service with a vulnerability that allows command injection through the admin interface.
services.cve_description: Allows remote attackers with administrative privileges to inject and execute OS commands on the server.

services.description: TCP service with a privilege escalation vulnerability due to misconfigured Docker images.
services.cve_description: A user with unprivileged access can escalate privileges to administrative level due to Docker misconfiguration.
services.banner: Welcome to the TCP service. Please authenticate.

services.description: HTTP service with a missing authentication vulnerability allowing unauthorized access to router functionalities.
services.cve_description: Unauthenticated remote attackers can directly access specific functionalities to obtain partial device information.
